meaning_template: Percentage of respondents indicating '{category}' of related work experience is required.

categories.3: Over 1 month, up to and including 3 months
categories.4: Over 3 months, up to and including 6 months
categories.5: Over 6 months, up to and including 1 year
categories.6: Over 1 year, up to and including 2 years
categories.7: Over 2 years, up to and including 4 years
categories.8: Over 4 years, up to and including 6 years
categories.9: Over 6 years, up to and including 8 years
categories.10: Over 8 years, up to and including 10 years

_comment: This defines a CATEGORY DISTRIBUTION scale. Each category becomes a separate interval scale (RW-1, RW-2, ... RW-11). When parsing rating data, map: Element ID='3.A.1', Scale ID='RW', Category=N -> scale_id='RW-N', value=Data Value (percentage 0-100).
